queue_manager.title: Queue manager name
queue_manager.description: The name of the IBM MQ queue manager to monitor.

channel.title: Server connection channel
channel.description: The server connection channel to use for connecting to the queue manager.

host.title: Host
host.description: Hostname or IP address of the queue manager.

port.title: Port
port.description: Port number of the queue manager listener.

collect_topics.title: Collect topic metrics
collect_topics.description: Enable collection of topic statistics (may impact performance).

collect_system_queues.title: Collect system queue metrics
collect_system_queues.description: Enable collection of system queue statistics (SYSTEM.* queues).

collect_system_channels.title: Collect system channel metrics
collect_system_channels.description: Enable collection of system channel statistics (SYSTEM.* channels).

collect_channel_config.title: Collect channel configuration
collect_channel_config.description: Enable collection of static channel configuration values (timeouts, limits, etc). These rarely change and consume storage.

queue_selector.title: Queue name selector
queue_selector.description: Regular expression to filter which queues to monitor.

channel_selector.title: Channel name selector
channel_selector.description: Regular expression to filter which channels to monitor.

collect_reset_queue_stats.title: Collect queue statistics (DESTRUCTIVE)
collect_reset_queue_stats.description: WARNING: Enables collection of message counts using MQCMD_RESET_Q_STATS which RESETS counters to zero after reading. This WILL BREAK other monitoring tools. Only enable if Netdata is the ONLY monitoring tool for MQ.
